name: Hot Mars 69
description: You play for the commander of the special forces group - Elon, ​​and you need to kill all the devil-mutants in the colony on Mars to avenge for the dead comrades, and to escape.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
